data.title: Facts About Beyonce
data.meta_description: Facts About Beyonce - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text: 1. Some Interesting Facts about Beyonce There are many rumors and speculations as to where does Beyonce live... She has a home in Los Angeles and Texas. But she is currently living in a $6.5 million dollar mansion in Indian Creek Village, Florida. She is there with husband Jay-Z. Biographical Information Beyonce was born on September 4, 1981 in Houston, Texas. Her father Mathew Knowles is a record manager. Her mother Tina is a hair stylist and costume designer. During her childhood, she took part in her school's performing arts. These were Beyonces first exposure to dancing and singing. Musical Career Knowles father would eventually manage the girl group Destiny’s Child of which Beyonce would be a member. Destiny’s Child would become one of the best selling groups today. After the group went on a break, Knowles embarked on a solo career. Her debut album Dangerously in Love came out in 2003. Featuring the hit songs "Baby Boy" and "Crazy in Love”, it sold millions of copies. That year Beyonce won five Grammy awards. After Destiny’s Child disbanded in 2005, Beyonce released B'Day, her second album. It became another hit with the chart topping songs "Beautiful Liar" and "Irreplaceable". In 2008 she came out with I Am... Sasha Fierce, her third solo album. It spawned four singles: "Sweet Dreams", "Halo”, "Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)" and "If I Were a Boy”. She won six Grammys for that album. Her fourth album 4 was released in 2011. Acting Career and Other Pursuits Knowles first acting job was in the 2001 musical film Carmen: A Hip Hopera. Her other notable film appearances are in Cadillac Records (2008), Dreamgirls (2006) and Austin Powers in Goldmember (2002). The House of Dereon is a women's fashion line that Knowles and her mother established in 2006. Its products were featured at the Destiny Fulfilled tour. Some of its products are outerwear, fur, handbags, denim and sportswear. She collaborated with House of Brands to produce shoes. Earlier in 2004, Beyonce and her mother set up Beyond Productions to handle the House of Dereon brand management and licensing. She also runs Beyonce Fashion Diva, a game with social network features. Knowles has appeared in Pepsi commercials and also their Internet and radio advertisements. She also has commercial endorsement deals with various perfumes and beauty products. As to how much does Beyonce weigh, it is between 125 and 130 lbs. She stands 5'5". References: http://www.tellmehowmuch.net/how-much-does-beyonce-weigh.html http://www.wheredoes.org/where-does-beyonce-live.html
